Package ci.gouv.dgbf.system.payroll.server.api

Interface PayrollComponentService.PayrollComponentSaveRequestDto

All Known Implementing Classes:
PayrollComponentService.PayrollComponentCreateRequestDto, PayrollComponentService.PayrollComponentUpdateRequestDto
Enclosing interface:
PayrollComponentService
public static interface PayrollComponentService.PayrollComponentSaveRequestDto
Cette interface représente une requête d'enregistrement.

Christian
